content.prompt: Complete the following code in order to calculate the height of a person in feet, given that his/her height is heightInInches inches. Assume that the initial value of variable heightInInches is already set to a positive integer.You need to convert the given heightInInches to feet. For example, 12 inches is 1 foot. Define a variable called heightInFeet and set the height in feet value to this variable. E.g. 1: If the value of heightInInches is 78, the code prints "Height in feet: 6.5" (without the quotations). Please pay attention to the white spaces!E.g. 2: If the value of heightInInches is 84, the code prints "Height in feet: 7.0" (without the quotations). Please pay attention to the white spaces!
